TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

> 2 hours ago, Tristonwilson12 said:
> 
> 
> Thanks red... if you couldnt tell.. i am back and cancer free!!!!!, its been one heck of a ride but i stuck with it. and pulled through with your guys help.. i am very happy to release beta 1 of the real KSC in ksp. and i am dubbing it the "He's Back?!" version. i can thank everyone enough... go get thee new Kerbal Konstructs for 1.1... and the launch sites!!! [on spacedock](http://spacedock.info/mod/459/Real%20Launch%20Sites/Real%20KSC%20in%20KSP)
>

Welcome back Triston!

Awesome mod! Been looking forward to this for a while. Welcome back! 

Am i missing something with selecting the launch sites with KK? None of the pads show up when I open the KK selector in VAB. I can see them when i launch from the stock pad so they're getting built. I have the KSC and Gantry folders installed in GameData. Do they need to be in the KerbalKonstructs folder or something?

Oh nice. I knew it had to be something simple since they were obviously getting built. I looked at the cfg's but i dont have much experience with KK so that was a wast of time. I'll let you know if i spot anything else. But they look amaaazing

ok so thanks the the brains of **[_Augustus_](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/115084-_augustus_/ "Go to _Augustus_'s profile")** he still had the files for the new missile row pad!!!... thanks bud!

New update Version 0.1.1 [on SpaceDock](http://spacedock.info/mod/459/Real%20Launch%20Sites/Real%20KSC%20in%20KSP)

Its back?

ITS BACK!!!!!  

I really need to get them model done. I was too busy. But I think I can handle it now but unfortunately my model will be split into two.

> 22 hours ago, Tristonwilson12 said:
> 
> 
> Im cancer free!!!! and i have the flu right now but nothing really bad!!
> 

Great to hear!

Hey the Spawnpoint fix worked, they're showing up in KK, but now the launchsites seem to be getting built at the wrong lat and long. They're getting placed way north (like 28 lat.). Not sure if they're supposed to be there, but they're actually being built under the terrain with the given altitude at those coordinates. I looked at the misslerow2.cfg and I didn't see any RefLongitude or RefLatitude for the launch sites. Again, not too familiar with KK so maybe that has nothing to do with it. Just FYI

>

Not sure if they're supposed to be there, but they're actually being built under the terrain with the given altitude at those coordinates. I looked at the misslerow2.cfg and I didn't see any RefLongitude or RefLatitude for the launch sites. Again, not too familiar with KK so maybe that has nothing to do with it. Just FYI

those locations are for RSS/RO you can delete them using the Ctrl+K menu and going to local instances, for now you can place them were you want using that menu and i can make a fix CFG when im home ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
